name: Gravity Shooter Thingy
description:
FULLSCREEN RECOMMENDED press r to reset the game after entering.

Left click shoots your shooty-gun.

Use Right click or Space to create a gravity source at the mouse.

WASD to move, left click to shoot towards the mouse

Mouse Wheel - Choose power of gravity wells and speed of projectiles. Not wise to shoot when this value is negative

F7 + O/P/U/I - increases/decreases speed / sets to 0/1

Left Arrow + 4 + Enter Toggles Debug mode. Use it to remove unsightly HUD (stops speed commands working)

R - Reset
